reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Certainly a 3 star hotel but very hood value for money, central location 5 mins to the main shopping area and nightlife. Only had B and B but Breakfast was good choice of food and pleasant service. leisure facilities and Gym very good, open to public so can get busy early evening.
reviews.title: Very Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Only downside was Room next to main road which could be noisy during the day, would suggest booking an inner room
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel in every way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was very impressed by this Hotel, which offers higher than 3 star standards.
reviews.title: cool and wet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My room was spacious, well appointed and furnished, and very clean. The Public areas were very good, with a comfortable lounge and Bar, nice Coffee Shop, and great Pool & Health Suite. All the staff were friendly and helpful. A very pleasant experience that I would recommend.
reviews.title: comfortable, friendly with no frills

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010
reviews.text: the mayfair hotel was very good. great bar. good indoor pool.the breakfast was served by a waiter a full english with toast tea or coffee excellent service. the one bad thing was the check out time 10am on sunday our flight was at 5 50 pm it was raining quite heavy so we left our bags at hotel and walked around the town looking for some place to sit and keep dry we found a cafe and sat for an hour till it stopped raining.they need to change the check out time to 11 or 12 oc on sunday
reviews.title: Great time spent here for parents Golden Wedding trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Started off badly, after travelling past most of the large hotels, we ended up in the outskirts of Saint Helier. We got a room that was dark and the carpet threadbare and dirty, the shower head was also dirty, so we went down and complained. A young irish girl was on the desk and was very helpful in transferring us to a larger room, this was much better. Our evening meals which were part of a free upgrade were very good. We were pleasantly surprised at the food selection and the friendly service and the speed of the courses arriving. The portions were fine and on all occasions I came away from the table quite full. The rep we had from David Urquhart was very good, she had a really good knowledge of all trips and attractions. The entertainment each evening was mediocre. All other amenities were very good
reviews.title: Honest review for may 2011

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: my wife and i went to this hotel last year and gave it the benefit of the doubt ( as i wrote in my last report of the mayfair ) sadly, it has got worse.
reviews.title: its got worse

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: when we got our keys and hotel info., i noticed they had us down for b & b when we were half board , this was changed , when we got to our room it was a twin, we wanted a double, this was changed, but alas, out the frying pan into the fire. our first room was on floor 3 in the centre of the hotel with no view except the roof of the kitchen/dining area, our other room was on the first floor in the centre of the hotel directly above the kitchen/dining area with fans running and all manner of noise but i didnt have the heart for more complaining, so we settled in to enjoy our holiday.
reviews.title: Mayfair Hotel Review

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011
reviews.text: the room we had on the first floor was small but comfortable and the double bed gave us a good nights sleep (apart from the noise) and everything functioned ok, except for the window lock and as this could be accessed from the roof of the kitchen/dining area we did tend to keep our valuables with us.
reviews.title: Three Star Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the meals....hmmm.....breakfast was very good with a great selection of cereals and juices , but oh dear......dinner was a total disaster as far as me and my wife were concerned.....with lamb and pork being totally inedible, the fat content of these being way over the top ( i would have had a major fall out with her if she had put it in front of me for sunday dinner ) the menus for these dinners has not changed or has changed very little since we were there five years ago and this was our fourth time.we did venture out on the town twice for our dinner as we didnt fancy what was being served.
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recommand this hotel, very clean, good food, good factilitates, swiming pool/gynnasium etc.
reviews.title: very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Rooms very good, and quite large. t.V. in room good size..
reviews.title: Good Choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Ideally situated for town & exploration of island with parking.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel as it didn't look up to much from the outside. The reception area was very spacious, nice lounge area coffe shop looked good and dining room one of the biggest I have seen. Lots of people for breakfast but all ran smoothly, breakfast consisted of a buffet ,fruit,cereal ,pastries etc. followed by a full english served to you (which I like).
reviews.title: Tenerfeast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I shared a twin room with my sister, we were both pleased with the room beds were very comfortable, largish bathroom downside the shower couldn't be directed where you wanted so was a bit of a struggle to take a shower also the room had a vaguely musty smell to it. Lots of corridors in this hotel took us a while to find the pool which was freezing but didn't let that put us off. The trip from the changingroom to the pool was abit off putting however as the changing room doesn't lead straight to the pool.Minor irritation.
reviews.title: Good location and excellent food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: People who have seen comments from me on Trip advisor as fair and I found this a "you get what you pay for" holiday.
reviews.title: Good middle of the road.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: For Jersey this was resonably price hotel and I booked it through an internet search which worked well.
reviews.title: We all enjojed our stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was about 2 mins from my families old home in Beresford street where I spent a lot of my childhood, so a perfect location for me and I think for most visitors to the island.
reviews.title: Good hotel marred by dining experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: You are that close to the town and about 10 mins from the bus station and its pathetic service. Comment elsewhere about this.
reviews.title: nice based hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The weather was perfect while I was there as it appears to be most Mays that I been there in my life.
reviews.title: PERFECT
